code: import axios from"axios";var url="http://localhost:3000/posts";export var fetchPosts=function fetchPosts(page){return axios.get("".concat(url,"?page=").concat(page));};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return axios.post(url,newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(id,updatedPost){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),updatedPost);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){return axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id),id);};export var likePost=function likePost(id){return axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"),id);};export var fetchPostsBySearch=function fetchPostsBySearch(searchQuery){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/search?searchQuery=").concat(searchQuery.search||"none","&tags=").concat(searchQuery.tags," "));};export var fetchPost=function fetchPost(id){return axios.get("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));};
